description: Order by User Mental Model, Not Code Structure

do.description: Order concepts by user encounter sequence
content: Order concepts by user encounter sequence
Put foundational objects BEFORE features that use them
Follow with operations on those objects
Ask from user perspective: What builds on what?
Don't hide core objects in Technical Implementation sections
Wrong: Start with features before introducing the objects they operate on
Don't follow code dependency graphs instead of user understanding flow
Wrong: Focus on technical structure rather than user mental model
